thread.title: Shannon Noll arrested outside Crazy Horse strip club in Adelaide
thread.title_full: Shannon Noll arrested outside Crazy Horse strip club in Adelaide

author: Sarah Muller
title: Shannon Noll arrested outside Crazy Horse strip club in Adelaide
text:
Shannon Noll arrested outside Crazy Horse strip club in Adelaide Sarah Muller More 
Australian singer Shannon Noll has been arrested and charged with assault outside an Adelaide strip club. 
Police took the 41-year-old into custody outside the Crazy Horse strip club on Hindley Street shortly before 2.30am on Sunday following reports of a disturbance. Art imitating life in Ocean's Eight? Play Video Shannon Noll arrested Shannon Noll arrested

Actor Tom Hardy is refusing to discuss rumours he will play the iconic spy over fears it will eliminate him from the casting pool. More videos Shannon Noll arrested 
Australian Idol runner-up Shannon Noll is arrested and charged with assault outside the Crazy Horse strip club in Adelaide. 
The Australian Idol runner-up had performed at a concert with John Farnham and Daryl Braithwaite earlier in the evening in Mannum, an hour east of Adelaide. 
Witness Alastair Longmuir told Channel 9 that Noll had been kicked out of the club. SHARE
